document.full_text: thirteen members of the pakistani frontier corps, including a colonel, were killed in an apparent friendly fire incident in a northwestern region infested with al qaeda and taliban-linked militants, a top military commander said on tuesday.
document.title: pakistan says 13 soldiers killed in friendly fire incident
lines_and_colors: thirteen members of the pakistani frontier corps, including a colonel, were killed in an apparent friendly fire incident in a northwestern region infested with al qaeda and taliban-linked militants, a top military commander said on tuesday.
